references.paper_title: Distilling the knowledge in a neural network
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of knowledge distillation, a technique used extensively in the paper for improving model performance.
This paper is foundational to adversarial machine learning, a topic the paper addresses by improving adversarial robustness.

references.paper_title: Towards deep learning models resistant to adversarial attacks
references.reason: This paper proposed adversarial training as a method for improving model robustness, a key area addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Theoretically principled trade-off between robustness and accuracy
references.reason: This paper provided a theoretical foundation for understanding the relationship between robustness and accuracy, a crucial aspect of the study.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduced the ResNet architecture, which is used in the experimental section of this paper, highlighting its importance in computer vision.
